posts.post_content:
Any back variation, only PSA.
I'd even consider a 2 if the price were right.
RayB

Help the man who started me on my T206 journey way back when on the CU boards. 

Hope you’re well Ray. 

Best,

Scott (lamontcarter)

Scott - Good to see you here.
Thanks for the props. Haven't visited over there in years.
Forgot about the "Everything T206 Thread".

Been out on the Monster for years now and thought I'd nibble a bit at the bottom of the food chain.
Seems to me there would be someone here who has upgraded or just wants out that could sell me their lo grade at reasonable prices.
Here's hoping.
RayB
Ray, they are looking for you on the Advice Board at imaginesports!

Typically if I get off to a fast start I'll stick with things.
3rd time revisiting the set.
Any sellers out there that can help?
RayB

Have had some kind help here on the Boards getting started again.
Thanks to all who have contacted me.
Still on the hunt. 
Any help is appreciated.
RayB

Page Bump.
Thanks everyone who has contacted me with offerings.
Much appreciated.
RayB

Bump of the new week. Will buy 2's and 2.5's potentially as well.
RayB
